message: Hi Bob, I am offering the product to you for $20000. Let me know if you are interested.
Hi Alice, $20000 is a bit too high for me. I am willing to buy the product for $8000. Let me know if this is acceptable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. Unfortunately, $8000 is below my minimum acceptable price. I can offer the product to you for $18000. Let me know if that works for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the discount, but $18000 is still a bit too high for me. I am willing to increase my offer to $10000. Let me know if this is something you would be willing to accept.
